overview: Compilation film of the three episode mini-series.  Fresh out of studio comes the newest Girlsway sci-fi thriller about a patented technology that brings Member Fantasies to life through next-generation virtual reality, and the lesbian android who becomes sentient. Trouble starts for android Alexis Fawx when Ms. Maverick (Brett Rossi) orders a custom Mommy Talk experience during her sex scene with teen Kenna James. Alexis malfunctions again when client Morgan Cain (Cadence Lux) pairs Alexis with squirt queen Adriana Chechik. Finally, Alexis seduces technician Serena Blair, her only hope to escape the pleasure park intact.
title: Fantasy Factory
